About Us

Our Story

Founded in 2020, E-Bookworm was born out of a passion for literature and a vision to make reading accessible to everyone, everywhere. We believe that knowledge should know no boundaries, and that's why we've dedicated ourselves to bringing a vast library of ebooks right to your fingertips.

What started as a small collection of digital books has now grown into a comprehensive platform, offering thousands of titles across various genres, from classic literature to contemporary bestsellers, academic texts to leisure reads.

Our Mission

To democratize knowledge by providing easy access to a world of literature through our extensive ebook collection, fostering a global community of readers and lifelong learners.

Our Vision

To become the go-to platform for digital reading, offering an unparalleled user experience and a diverse range of high-quality ebooks that cater to readers of all ages and interests.

Our Values

  • Accessibility
  • Diversity
  • Innovation
  • Customer-Centric
  • Environmental Consciousness
